title: jollyburger
description: This is a project our team produced during a one week beginner ReactJS workshop 'DIGIT' organized by SP Finki. We're proud to claim that we won first place.

title: jimbo
description: jimbo - your local gym bro. A full-stack application me and a friend are building as a final project for our faculty course 'Integrated Systems'. I'm responsible for the backend side of things (.NET Core WebAPI).

title: Flora Education
description: Frontend React prototype application for my Flora Education project. This frontend application is part of my finals project for my faculty course 'Designing Interactive Systems'.

title: Flora Education API
description: .NET Core Web API for my Flora Education project. This backend application is part of my finals project for my faculty course 'Designing Interactive Systems'.

title: SQAT Project
description: Project for my faculty course 'Software Quality and Testing'. I test the service layer of my flora-education-api using NUnit, Moq for unit testing and I achieve 100% mutation coverage using Stryker. I used Cypress for end-to-end testing on the frontend.

title: Bookhive v1
description: Bookhive, a place where people can browse books and join book clubs. This SSR application was built using Spring Boot and Thymeleaf as part of the final project for my faculty course 'Web Programming'.

title: MAPedonija
description: MAPedonija is a website that lets you find the location and other relative information of different shops around Macedonia.

title: Flora Warehouse Management System
description: A warehouse management system built using .NET Framework Windows Forms, SQLite and SAP Crystal Reports. This was a project built for my faculty course 'Visual Programming'.
